meanings.definition: A type of tree or shrub in the genus Conocarpus.
meanings.sent1: The buttonwoods in the park provide shade on sunny days.
meanings.sent2: I love the smell of buttonwoods in bloom during spring.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels play hide and seek among the buttonwoods.
meanings.sent4: The buttonwoods stood tall like guardians of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The buttonwoods rustled in the wind, whispering secrets of nature.

meanings.definition: A type of financial instrument or contract.
meanings.sent1: Investors often use buttonwoods to diversify their portfolios.
meanings.sent2: The bank offered a new buttonwoods option for customers.
meanings.sent3: The buttonwoods deal was so good, it felt like winning the lottery.
meanings.sent4: She navigated the complex world of finance with buttonwoods as her guide.
meanings.sent5: The buttonwoods of the stock market swayed with uncertainty.
